original_text: And the king of Egypt called for the midwives, and said unto them, Why have ye done this thing, and have saved the men children alive?
korean_text: 애굽 왕이 산파를 불러 그들에게 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 이같이 남자 아기들을 살렸느냐

sentences.original_text: And the king of Egypt called for the midwives
Why have ye done this thing
and have saved the men children alive?
